response.original_title: Gay USA: Snapshots of 1970s LGBT Resistance
response.overview: Stepping out of the sixties and in the wake of the Stonewall Riots, (considered the birth of the modern LGBTQIA+ liberation movement), the 1970s would prove to be a decade energized by queer activism, political and social change and pride. Celebrating such a vitally important legacy, this collection of gay protest and parade films is an essential multifaceted document of a period of revolution and jubilation.
response.title: Gay USA: Snapshots of 1970s LGBT Resistance
